titleStmt.title: A letter writ by Mijn Heer Fagel, pensioner of Holland, to Mr. James Stewart, advocate giving an account of the Prince and Princess of Orange's thoughts concerning the repeal of the test and the penal lavvs.
titleStmt.author: Fagel, Gaspar, 1634-1688.
Stewart, James, Sir, 1635-1713.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
